general.name: Adam Cheong
general.Title: Roboticist & Engineer
general.summary: Inventive high school student in San Francisco with a passion for science, engineering, math and finance; natural born athlete who loves to climb rocks, surf waves, ski downhill, and run cross-country; electric guitar aficionado.

experience.name: Watney Robotics, San Francisco, California
experience.summary: I assemble and test the robot controllers that allow humans from halfway around the world to teleoperate a pair of robot arms with precision. I alos train the robots.

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
